# Aggregate numbers
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Aggregates all numbers in this set using a mathematical operation.

## Parameter

### Operator

One of '+', '*', 'min', 'max', 'average'.

- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `None`
